original: @6b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @6b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: t'a re de bi sto tram ae ka bi sham ti ka s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: t'a re de bi sto tram ae ka bi sham ti ka s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Tāredhīstotraikavimśatikasaṃpādanā-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /🔽rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba / rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: The Praise of the Twenty-One Praises of the Goddess Tārā🔽Homage to the noble lady Tārā.

original: phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal sgrol ma myur ma dpa' mo //
translated: Homage to Tārā, the swift and heroic one,

original: spyan ni skad cig glog dang 'dra ma //
analyzed: spyan ni skad cig glog dang 'dra ma //
translated: Whose eyes are like the flash of lightning,🔽Born from the thousand-petaled lotus

original: 'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi //🔽ge sar bye ba las ni byung ma //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum mgon chu skyes zhal gyi // ge sar bye ba las ni byung ma //
translated: In the face of the three worlds' protector.

original: de la dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma nam mkha'i dkyil na padma dmar po'i steng na bzhugs pa sku mdog dmar mo me lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba can /
analyzed: de la dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma nam mkha'i dkyil na padma dmar po'i steng na bzhugs pa sku mdog dmar mo me lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba can /
translated: To begin with, the Blessed Lady Tārā is visualized in the center of the sky, seated on a red lotus, her body red like fire,

original: zhal gcig la spyan gnyis ma phyag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: zhal gcig la spyan gnyis ma phyag brgyad pa'o //
translated: with one face and two eyes, and eight arms.

original: phyag dang po gnyis sgrog par bzhengs pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan @7a * //
analyzed: phyag dang po gnyis sgrog par bzhengs pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan @7a * //
translated: Her first two hands are in the gesture of supreme generosity,

original: pa'o ; / de'i 'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu gzhan la 'phen pa thugs kar bkang ba /
analyzed: pa'o ; / de'i 'og ma gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu gzhan la 'phen pa thugs kar bkang ba /
translated: The two below that are a bow and arrow, which are drawn to the heart.

original: g-yas kyi gsum pa na 'khor lo //
analyzed: g-yas kyi gsum pa na 'khor lo //
translated: On the third right hand is a wheel.

original: bzhi pa na ral gri /
analyzed: bzhi pa na ral gri /
translated: On the fourth is a sword.

original: g-yon gyi gsum pa na dung /
analyzed: g-yon gyi gsum pa na dung /
translated: On the third left hand is a conch.

original: bzhi pa na zhags pa bsnams pa /
analyzed: bzhi pa na zhags pa bsnams pa /
translated: On the fourth is a lasso.

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: She is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma myur zhing rab tu dpa' ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u dang po rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma myur zhing rab tu dpa' ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u dang po rdzogs so /
translated: The first chapter of the sādhana of Noble Tārā, Swift and Courageous, is complete.

original: // / phyag 'tshal ston ka'i zla ba kun tu //🔽gang ba brgya ni brtsegs pa'i zhal ma //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal ston ka'i zla ba kun tu // gang ba brgya ni brtsegs pa'i zhal ma //
translated: Homage to you whose face is a mass

original: skar ma stong phrag tshogs pa rnams kyis //
analyzed: skar ma stong phrag tshogs pa rnams kyis //
translated: of a hundred full autumn moons,

original: rab tu phye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma //
analyzed: rab tu phye ba'i 'od rab 'bar ma //
translated: whose light is blazing,🔽like the stars in the sky.

original: de la dang por re zhig ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba'i sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gsum phyag bcu gnyis ma /
analyzed: de la dang por re zhig ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba'i sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gsum phyag bcu gnyis ma /
translated: First, there is White Tārā, who is white like the autumn moon, with three faces and twelve arms.

original: zhal gsum ni rtsa zhal dkar ba /
analyzed: zhal gsum ni rtsa zhal dkar ba /
translated: The three faces are white,

original: g-yas sngo zhing g-yon ser ba'o //
analyzed: g-yas sngo zhing g-yon ser ba'o //
translated: the right face is blue, and the left face is yellow.

original: phyag dang po gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa /
analyzed: phyag dang po gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa /
translated: The first two hands are in the gesture of meditative equipoise.

original: g-yas gnyis pa kha tv'am ga / gsum pa na 'khor lo /
analyzed: g-yas gnyis pa kha tv'am ga / gsum pa na 'khor lo /
translated: The third a wheel.

original: bzhi phan rin po che /
analyzed: bzhi phan rin po che /
translated: The fourth a jewel.

original: lnga pa na rdo rje /
analyzed: lnga pa na rdo rje /
translated: The fifth a vajra.

original: drug pa na me tog gi phreng ba'o //
analyzed: drug pa na me tog gi phreng ba'o //
translated: The sixth a flower garland.

original: g-yon gyi gnyis pa na ril ba spyi blugs /
analyzed: g-yon gyi gnyis pa na ril ba spyi blugs /
translated: The second left hand holds a water jar.

original: gsum pa na autpala /
analyzed: gsum pa na autpala /
translated: The third an utpala.

original: bzhi pa na dril bu /
analyzed: bzhi pa na dril bu /
translated: The fourth a bell.

original: lnga pa na bum pa /
analyzed: lnga pa na bum pa /
translated: The fifth a vase.

original: drug pa na po ti bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa na po ti bsnams pa'o //
translated: The sixth a book.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so /🔽// / phyag 'tshal gser sngo chu nas skyes kyi //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so / // / phyag 'tshal gser sngo chu nas skyes kyi //
translated: The sādhana of Noble Tārā, White as the Autumn Moon, in two chapters, is complete.

original: padma phyag ni rnam par brgyan ma //
analyzed: padma phyag ni rnam par brgyan ma //
translated: Homage to the one whose hands are adorned with golden blue water-born lotuses,🔽who is the field of the glory of the highest good,🔽the essence of the three worlds, the mother of the buddhas.

original: sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba //
analyzed: sbyin pa brtson 'grus dka' thub zhi ba //
translated: Homage to you, Tārā, who are generosity, diligence, austerity, peace,

original: bzod pa bsam gtan spyod yul nyid ma //
analyzed: bzod pa bsam gtan spyod yul nyid ma //
translated: patience, and the sphere of meditation.

original: rje btsun ma sgrol ma gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig phyag bcu ma /
analyzed: rje btsun ma sgrol ma gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig phyag bcu ma /
translated: Noble Tārā is golden-colored, with one face and ten arms.

original: sna tshogs padma'i steng gi nyi ma la gnas ma /
analyzed: sna tshogs padma'i steng gi nyi ma la gnas ma /
translated: She stands on a sun on a multicolored lotus.

original: phyag g-yas kyi dang po na phreng ba thugs kar 'dzin pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas kyi dang po na phreng ba thugs kar 'dzin pa /
translated: In the first right hand at her heart she holds a rosary.

original: gnyis pa na ral gri /
analyzed: gnyis pa na ral gri /
translated: In the second, a sword.

original: gsum pa na mda' 'phen par mdzad pa /
analyzed: gsum pa na mda' 'phen par mdzad pa /
translated: In the third, she shoots an arrow.

original: bzhi pa na rdo rje /
analyzed: bzhi pa na rdo rje /
translated: In the fourth, a vajra.

original: lnga pa na dbyu gu'o //
analyzed: lnga pa na dbyu gu'o //
translated: In the fifth, a staff.

original: g-yon gyi dang po na dar dpyangs /
analyzed: g-yon gyi dang po na dar dpyangs /
translated: In the first of the left [hands], a banner.

original: gnyis pa na zhags pa gsum pa na padma /
analyzed: gnyis pa na zhags pa gsum pa na padma /
translated: In the second, a noose. In the third, a lotus.

original: bzhi pa na dril bu /
analyzed: bzhi pa na dril bu /
translated: In the fourth, a bell.

original: lnga pa na gzhu bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: lnga pa na gzhu bsnams pa'o //
translated: In the fifth, a bow.

original: de yang rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
translated: She sits in vajra posture.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma gser mdog can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma gser mdog can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba'i le'u gsum pa rdzogs so /
translated: The third chapter of the sādhana called The Sādhana of Noble Tārā with a Golden Hue is complete.

original: // / phyag 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug @7b tor ;🔽/ mtha' yas rnam par rgyal bar spyod ma //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug @7b tor ; / mtha' yas rnam par rgyal bar spyod ma //
translated: Homage to the uṣṇīṣa of the Tathāgata,🔽Victorious in the infinite conduct,

original: ma lus pha rol phyin pa thob pa'i //
analyzed: ma lus pha rol phyin pa thob pa'i //
translated: Attaining the perfections without exception,

original: rgyal ba'i sras kyis shin tu brtan ma //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyis shin tu brtan ma //
translated: The bodhisattva's very firm [conduct].

original: padma ser po dang zla ba'i dkyil na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis brtan par bzhugs pa'i rje btsun ma gser gyi mdog can /
analyzed: padma ser po dang zla ba'i dkyil na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis brtan par bzhugs pa'i rje btsun ma gser gyi mdog can /
translated: On a yellow lotus and moon disc, the noble lady sits firmly in bodhisattva posture, golden in color,

original: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
translated: with one face and four arms.

original: g-yas dang po mchog sbyin pa /
analyzed: g-yas dang po mchog sbyin pa /
translated: The first right hand is in the boon-granting gesture.

original: gnyis phan phreng ba /
analyzed: gnyis phan phreng ba /
translated: The second holds a rosary.

original: g-yon dang po na ril ba spyi blugs /
analyzed: g-yon dang po na ril ba spyi blugs /
translated: The first left hand holds a water vessel.

original: gnyis pa na dbyu gu bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa na dbyu gu bsnams pa'o //
translated: The second holds a staff.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa rdzogs so /
translated: The chapter on the sādhana of Noble Tārā called “The Tathāgata’s Uṣṇīṣa Victorious in All Directions” is concluded.

original: // / phyag 'tshal tutt'a re h'um yi ges //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal tutt'a re h'um yi ges //
translated: Homage to the syllable TUTTĀRE HŪṂ,

original: 'dod dang phyogs dang nam mkha' gang ma //
analyzed: 'dod dang phyogs dang nam mkha' gang ma //
translated: Which fills the desire realm, the cardinal directions, and space,

original: 'jig rten gsum po zhabs kyis mnan te //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po zhabs kyis mnan te //
translated: With your feet trampling the three worlds,

original: lus pa med par 'gugs par nus ma //
analyzed: lus pa med par 'gugs par nus ma //
translated: You are able to summon without exception.

original: rje btsun ma sku mdog ser mo //
analyzed: rje btsun ma sku mdog ser mo //
translated: The noble lady is yellow in color,

original: zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: Seated on a moon seat in vajra posture,

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ;
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ;
translated: With one face and two arms.

original: g-yas skyabs sbyin pa /
analyzed: g-yas skyabs sbyin pa /
translated: The right hand is in the boon-granting gesture.

original: g-yon padma ser po bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon padma ser po bsnams pa'o //
translated: The left holds a yellow lotus.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma h'um gi sgra rab tu sgrogs ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma h'um gi sgra rab tu sgrogs ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so /
translated: The chapter on the sādhana of Noble Tārā called “Proclaiming the Sound of HŪṂ” is concluded.

original: // / phyag 'tshal brgya byin me lha tshangs pa //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal brgya byin me lha tshangs pa //
translated: Homage to you who are worshipped by Indra, Agni, Brahma,

original: rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma //
analyzed: rlung lha sna tshogs dbang phyug mchod ma //
translated: Vayu, Isvara, and Maheshvara,🔽And who are praised by the hosts of bhutas, vetalas, gandharvas,

original: 'byung po ro langs dri za rnams dang // gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mdun nas bstod ma //
analyzed: 'byung po ro langs dri za rnams dang // gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mdun nas bstod ma //
translated: and yakshas.

original: rje btsun ma dmar mo /
analyzed: rje btsun ma dmar mo /
translated: Red Exalted Lady

original: padma dmar po dang nyi ma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma dmar po dang nyi ma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: She sits in the vajra posture on a seat of a red lotus and sun.

original: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
translated: She has one face and four arms.

original: g-yas kyi dang po rdo rje /
analyzed: g-yas kyi dang po rdo rje /
translated: The first right hand holds a vajra.

original: gnyis pa ral gri /
analyzed: gnyis pa ral gri /
translated: The second right hand holds a sword.

original: g-yon gyi dang po sdigs mdzub /
analyzed: g-yon gyi dang po sdigs mdzub /
translated: The first left hand makes the threatening gesture.

original: gnyis pa na zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa na zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: The second left hand holds a noose.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ma zhas bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ma zhas bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa rdzogs so /
translated: The chapter on the sādhana of Noble Tārā called Victorious Over the Three Worlds is completed.

original: // / phyag 'tshal trat ces bya dang phat kyis //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal trat ces bya dang phat kyis //
translated: Homage to you who with the sounds of trat and phat

original: pha rol 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'joms ma //
analyzed: pha rol 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'joms ma //
translated: Destroy the magical devices of enemies,

original: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te //
analyzed: g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan te //
translated: Standing with right leg bent and left extended,

original: me 'bar 'khrug ba shin tu 'bar ma //
analyzed: me 'bar 'khrug ba shin tu 'bar ma //
translated: Blazing with a mass of fire.

original: rje btsun ma nag mo //
analyzed: rje btsun ma nag mo //
translated: The Venerable Black Lady.

original: padma ser po dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma ser po dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
translated: She stands on a yellow lotus and sun disk, with her left leg extended.

original: na bza' ser po mnabs pa /
analyzed: na bza' ser po mnabs pa /
translated: She wears a yellow garment.

original: rin po che'i cod pan can /
analyzed: rin po che'i cod pan can /
translated: She has a jeweled crown.

original: rkang gdub la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rkang gdub la sogs pa dang ldan pa /
translated: She is adorned with anklets and so forth.

original: @8a * // zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma dbu skra gyen du brdzes shing sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: @8a * // zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma dbu skra gyen du brdzes shing sbrul gyis brgyan pa /
translated: She has one face, four arms, and hair bristling upward, adorned with snakes.

original: g-yas dang po na 'khor lo /
analyzed: g-yas dang po na 'khor lo /
translated: In the first right hand she holds a wheel.

original: gnyis pa na ral gri /
analyzed: gnyis pa na ral gri /
translated: In the second she holds a sword.

original: g-yon dang po skye gnas kyi steng na zhags pa bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon dang po skye gnas kyi steng na zhags pa bsnams pa /
translated: In the first left hand, above her lap, she holds a noose.

original: gnyis pa brkyang ste sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa brkyang ste sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
translated: In the second she makes the threatening gesture with an extended index finger.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma gzhan 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma gzhan 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the chapter on the sādhana of the Noble Tārā called Destroyer of the Other Side, the seventh.

original: // / phyag 'tshal tu res 'jigs pa chen mo //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal tu res 'jigs pa chen mo //
translated: Homage to Ture, the Greatly Fearful,

original: bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms ma //
analyzed: bdud kyi dpa' bo rnam par 'joms ma //
translated: The Hero of Māra, the Destroyer,

original: chu skyes zhal ni khro gnyer ldan mdzad //
analyzed: chu skyes zhal ni khro gnyer ldan mdzad //
translated: With a lotus face, frowning,

original: dgra bo thams cad ma lus gsod ma //
analyzed: dgra bo thams cad ma lus gsod ma //
translated: Killing all enemies without exception.

original: rje btsun ma gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
analyzed: rje btsun ma gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
translated: The venerable one is golden-colored, with one face and four arms.

original: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i steng na chu srin la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i steng na chu srin la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
translated: She stands in half-lotus posture on a red lotus and moon, on a makara.

original: g-yas dang po na shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga bzung ba /
analyzed: g-yas dang po na shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga bzung ba /
translated: In the first right hand she holds a branch of an aśoka tree.

original: gnyis pa na rin po che bsnams shing mchog stsol ba /
analyzed: gnyis pa na rin po che bsnams shing mchog stsol ba /
translated: In the second she holds a jewel and grants boons.

original: g-yon dang po na padma /
analyzed: g-yon dang po na padma /
translated: In the first left hand she holds a lotus.

original: gnyis pa na bum pa bsnams pa'o //🔽'phags ma sgrol ma bdud thams cad 'joms shing /
analyzed: gnyis pa na bum pa bsnams pa'o // 'phags ma sgrol ma bdud thams cad 'joms shing /
translated: In the second she holds a vase.

original: dbang mchog ster bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so /🔽// / phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum mtshon phyag rgya'i //
analyzed: dbang mchog ster bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so / // / phyag 'tshal dkon mchog gsum mtshon phyag rgya'i //
translated: This concludes the eighth chapter of the sādhana called “The Noble Tārā Who Vanquishes All Evils and Bestows Supreme Power.”🔽Homage to the one adorned at the heart with the mudrā

original: sor mos thugs kar rnam par brgyan ma //🔽ma lus phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i //
analyzed: sor mos thugs kar rnam par brgyan ma // ma lus phyogs kyi 'khor los brgyan pa'i //
translated: indicating the Three Jewels, with fingers🔽arranged in the shape of a mace,🔽and with a garland of her own light

original: rang gi 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'khrugs ma //
analyzed: rang gi 'od kyi tshogs rnams 'khrugs ma //
translated: radiating from the cakras in all the directions.

original: rje btsun ma padma r'a ga'i mdog can /
analyzed: rje btsun ma padma r'a ga'i mdog can /
translated: The venerable one is the color of red coral.

original: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa /
translated: She stands upon a red lotus and moon.

original: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
translated: She has one face and four arms.

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ma /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ma /
translated: She is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: phyag dang po gnyis rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: phyag dang po gnyis rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i phyag rgya ste /
translated: Her first two hands make the gesture of intense joy,

original: dang po'i phyag rgya lta bu'o //
analyzed: dang po'i phyag rgya lta bu'o //
translated: like the first mudra.

original: g-yas gnyis pas gar byed pa /
analyzed: g-yas gnyis pas gar byed pa /
translated: Her second right hand dances.

original: g-yon gnyis pa shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga 'dzin pa'i phyag gis sems can thams cad la rin po che'i char rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon gnyis pa shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga 'dzin pa'i phyag gis sems can thams cad la rin po che'i char rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa'o //
translated: Her second left hand holds a branch of an aśoka tree, and with it she showers all beings with a rain of jewels.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma mchog stsol bzhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma mchog stsol bzhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so /
translated: The ninth chapter, the means of achievement called Noble Tārā Bestowing the Best, is concluded.

original: // / phyag 'tshal rab tu dga' bas brjid pa'i //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal rab tu dga' bas brjid pa'i //
translated: Homage to you who are resplendent with intense joy,

original: dbu rgyan 'od kyi phreng bas spel ma //
analyzed: dbu rgyan 'od kyi phreng bas spel ma //
translated: your crown adorned with a garland of light,

original: bzhad pa rab bzhad tutt'a re yis //
analyzed: bzhad pa rab bzhad tutt'a re yis //
translated: laughing, laughing, with tut tāre,

original: bdud dang 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma //
analyzed: bdud dang 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma //
translated: taming demons and worldly lords.

original: rje btsun ma dmar mo padma dmar po zla @8b ba'i steng na rol pas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: rje btsun ma dmar mo padma dmar po zla @8b ba'i steng na rol pas bzhugs pa /
translated: The venerable lady is red, standing on a red lotus and moon.

original: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
translated: She has one face and four arms.

original: phyag dang po gnyis spyi bor rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa /
analyzed: phyag dang po gnyis spyi bor rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa /
translated: Her first two hands are in the gesture of supreme joy above her head.

original: g-yas gnyis pa na ral gri'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
analyzed: g-yas gnyis pa na ral gri'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa /
translated: Her second right hand holds a sword.

original: g-yon gnyis pa na shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga bzung ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon gnyis pa na shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga bzung ba'o //
translated: Her second left hand holds a branch of an aśoka tree.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma mya ngan thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma mya ngan thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu pa rdzogs so /
translated: The tenth chapter, the means of achievement called “Noble Tārā, the Dispeller of All Suffering,” is complete.

original: // / phyag 'tshal sa gzhi skyong ba'i tshogs rnams //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal sa gzhi skyong ba'i tshogs rnams //
translated: Homage to the one who is able to summon

original: thams cad 'gugs par nus pa nyid ma //
analyzed: thams cad 'gugs par nus pa nyid ma //
translated: all the hosts of earth-protectors,

original: khro gnyer g-yo ba'i yi ge h'um gis //
analyzed: khro gnyer g-yo ba'i yi ge h'um gis //
translated: with the letter hūṃ, which is frowning and moving,

original: phongs pa thams cad rnam par sgrol ma //
analyzed: phongs pa thams cad rnam par sgrol ma //
translated: who liberates from all misfortune.

original: rje btsun ma mun pa'i mdog can nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na padma la zhabs g-yas brkyang ba'i rol pas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: rje btsun ma mun pa'i mdog can nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na padma la zhabs g-yas brkyang ba'i rol pas bzhugs pa /
translated: The venerable one has the color of darkness, stands on a lotus on a sun disc, and is in the posture of right leg extended.

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
translated: She has one face and two arms.

original: phyogs mtshams brgyad nas gza' brgyad g-yas na bsnams pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs pa /
analyzed: phyogs mtshams brgyad nas gza' brgyad g-yas na bsnams pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs pa /
translated: The eight planets in the eight directions are drawn in with the iron hooks held in his right hands.

original: phyag g-yon pas rol pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yon pas rol pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: He holds a playful lasso in his left hands.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs shing phongs ba thams cad sel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs shing phongs ba thams cad sel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the eleventh chapter of the “Sādhana of Noble Tārā Who Attracts the Entire World and Removes All Poverty.”

original: // / phyag 'tshal zla ba'i dum bus dbu brgyan //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal zla ba'i dum bus dbu brgyan //
translated: Homage to you who are crowned with a piece of the moon,

original: brgyan pa thams cad shin tu 'bar ma /🔽ral pa'i khrod nas 'od dpag med las //
analyzed: brgyan pa thams cad shin tu 'bar ma / ral pa'i khrod nas 'od dpag med las //
translated: who blaze with all ornaments,🔽who have Amitābha in your hair,

original: rtag par shin tu 'od ni mdzad ma //
analyzed: rtag par shin tu 'od ni mdzad ma //
translated: who always shine brilliantly.

original: rje btsun ma 'phags ma gser gyi mdog can /
analyzed: rje btsun ma 'phags ma gser gyi mdog can /
translated: The noble lady is golden in color,

original: sna tshogs padma'i steng na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: sna tshogs padma'i steng na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: seated on a multicolored lotus and moon disc in the vajra posture,

original: zhal gcig phyag brgyad ma /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag brgyad ma /
translated: with one face and eight arms.

original: g-yas dang po na rtse gsum pa gnyis pa na lcags kyu /
analyzed: g-yas dang po na rtse gsum pa gnyis pa na lcags kyu /
translated: In her first right hand she holds a trident, in the second an iron hook,

original: gsum pa na rdo rje /
analyzed: gsum pa na rdo rje /
translated: in the third a vajra,

original: bzhi pa na ral gri /
analyzed: bzhi pa na ral gri /
translated: and in the fourth a sword.

original: g-yon dang po na rin po che thugs kar bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon dang po na rin po che thugs kar bsnams pa /
translated: In the first left hand she holds a jewel to her heart.

original: gnyis pas lcags kyu /
analyzed: gnyis pas lcags kyu /
translated: In the second is a hook.

original: gsum pas dbyu gu /
analyzed: gsum pas dbyu gu /
translated: In the third is a staff.

original: bzhi pas bum pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pas bum pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: In the fourth is a vase.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma bkra shis thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sgrab thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma bkra shis thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sgrab thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so /
translated: This concludes the twelfth chapter of the “Sadhana of Noble Tara, Bestower of All Blessings.”

original: // / phyag 'tshal ba skal ba'i mtha' ma'i me ltar //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal ba skal ba'i mtha' ma'i me ltar //
translated: Homage to the one who, like the fire at the end of the eon,

original: 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i dbus na gnas ma //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i dbus na gnas ma //
translated: Resides in the midst of a garland of blazing light,

original: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum kun nas bskor dga'i //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum kun nas bskor dga'i //
translated: With right leg extended and left drawn in,

original: dgra yi dpung ni rnam par 'joms ma //
analyzed: dgra yi dpung ni rnam par 'joms ma //
translated: Triumphant over the army of enemies.

original: rje btsun ma dmar mo @9a * //
analyzed: rje btsun ma dmar mo @9a * //
translated: The noble lady is red,

original: padma dmar po'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dang bcas pa la g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa /
analyzed: padma dmar po'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dang bcas pa la g-yas brkyang bas gnas pa /
translated: standing on a red lotus and sun maṇḍala with blazing light rays, with her right leg extended.

original: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
translated: She has one face and four arms.

original: smin ma dang mtshu gyen du rtsol bas lta ba /
analyzed: smin ma dang mtshu gyen du rtsol bas lta ba /
translated: Her eyebrows and eyes are arched.

original: g-yas dang po na ral gri //
analyzed: g-yas dang po na ral gri //
translated: In the first right hand is a sword.

original: gnyis pa na mda' //
analyzed: gnyis pa na mda' //
translated: In the second is an arrow.

original: g-yon dang po na 'khor lo //
analyzed: g-yon dang po na 'khor lo //
translated: In the first left hand is a chakram.

original: gnyis pa na gzhu bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa na gzhu bsnams pa'o //
translated: On the second, she holds a bow.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so /🔽// / phyag 'tshal sa gzhi'i ngos la phyag gi //🔽mthil gyis bsnun cing zhabs kyis brdung ma /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa rdzogs so / // / phyag 'tshal sa gzhi'i ngos la phyag gi // mthil gyis bsnun cing zhabs kyis brdung ma /
translated: This concludes the thirteenth chapter of the Noble Tara's Ripening Moon Practice.🔽Homage to you who with the palm of your🔽hand strike the surface of the earth,

original: khro gnyer can mdzad yi ge h'um gis /
analyzed: khro gnyer can mdzad yi ge h'um gis /
translated: and with your foot trample upon

original: rim pa bdun po rnams ni 'gems ma //
analyzed: rim pa bdun po rnams ni 'gems ma //
translated: the seven levels, frowning and uttering the syllable hum.

original: rje bcun ma sku mdog nag mo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na padma dmar ser la g-yas brkyang ba'i gar gyis yid gas mnan cing bzhugs pa /
analyzed: rje bcun ma sku mdog nag mo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na padma dmar ser la g-yas brkyang ba'i gar gyis yid gas mnan cing bzhugs pa /
translated: The noble lady is black, standing on a red-orange lotus on a sun disk, with her right leg extended in a dancing posture, trampling upon Yama.

original: zhal gsum la spyan gsum mnga' ba'i rtsa ba'i zhal nag po /
analyzed: zhal gsum la spyan gsum mnga' ba'i rtsa ba'i zhal nag po /
translated: She has three faces, each with three eyes. Her main face is black,

original: g-yas dkar ba /
analyzed: g-yas dkar ba /
translated: the right is white,

original: g-yon dmar ba /
analyzed: g-yon dmar ba /
translated: and the left is red.

original: phyag drug pa khro gnyer dang ldan zhing zhal dang smin ma bsdus pa can /
analyzed: phyag drug pa khro gnyer dang ldan zhing zhal dang smin ma bsdus pa can /
translated: She has six arms, is frowning, and has a scowling face and furrowed brow.

original: mi'i rgyu ma zhal du gsol zhing mi mgo'i cod pan can /
analyzed: mi'i rgyu ma zhal du gsol zhing mi mgo'i cod pan can /
translated: She eats human entrails and wears a crown of human heads.

original: thod pa'i do shal dang ldan pa /
analyzed: thod pa'i do shal dang ldan pa /
translated: She has a garland of skulls.

original: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa /
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa /
translated: He wears a tiger-skin skirt.

original: sbrul brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: sbrul brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with the eight snakes.

original: phyogs dang mtshams bzhir myu gu 'dzin pa /
analyzed: phyogs dang mtshams bzhir myu gu 'dzin pa /
translated: He holds a sprout in each of the four directions and subdirections.

original: phyag g-yas dang po ral gri /
analyzed: phyag g-yas dang po ral gri /
translated: His first right hand holds a sword.

original: gnyis pa lcags kyu /
analyzed: gnyis pa lcags kyu /
translated: The second holds a goad.

original: gsum pa dbyu gu /
analyzed: gsum pa dbyu gu /
translated: The third holds a club.

original: g-yon dang po khrag gis bkang pa'i thod pa /
analyzed: g-yon dang po khrag gis bkang pa'i thod pa /
translated: His first left hand holds a skull-cup filled with blood.

original: gnyis pa na zhags pa /
analyzed: gnyis pa na zhags pa /
translated: The second holds a noose.

original: gsum pa na mgo bo bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa na mgo bo bsnams pa'o //
translated: The third holds a head.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'gugs pa'i khro mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma 'gugs pa'i khro mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa rdzogs so /
translated: The fourteenth chapter is complete.

original: // / phyag 'tshal bde ma dge ma zhi ma //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal bde ma dge ma zhi ma //
translated: Homage to you, who are auspicious, virtuous, and peaceful,

original: mya ngan 'das zhi spyod yul nyid ma /
analyzed: mya ngan 'das zhi spyod yul nyid ma /
translated: Whose sphere of activity is the peace of nirvana,

original: sv'a h'a aom dang yang dag ldan ma //
analyzed: sv'a h'a aom dang yang dag ldan ma //
translated: Who are endowed with svāhā, oṃ,

original: sdig pa chen mo 'joms pa nyid ma //
analyzed: sdig pa chen mo 'joms pa nyid ma //
translated: And who are the destroyer of great evil.

original: rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag drug ma /
analyzed: rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag drug ma /
translated: The venerable one is white, with one face and six arms.

original: padma dkar po'i steng na zla ba la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma dkar po'i steng na zla ba la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: She sits in the vajra posture on a moon on a white lotus.

original: g-yas dang pos phreng ba thugs kar bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yas dang pos phreng ba thugs kar bsnams pa /
translated: Her first right hand holds a rosary to her heart.

original: gnyis pa mchog sbyin /
analyzed: gnyis pa mchog sbyin /
translated: The second is granting boons.

original: gsum pa dbyu gu /
analyzed: gsum pa dbyu gu /
translated: The third is a staff.

original: g-yon dang po na padma /
analyzed: g-yon dang po na padma /
translated: The first left holds a lotus.

original: gnyis pa na ril ba spyi blugs /
analyzed: gnyis pa na ril ba spyi blugs /
translated: The second holds a water pot.

original: gsum pa po ti bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa po ti bsnams pa'o //
translated: The third holds a book.

original: 'phags ma @9b sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags ma @9b sgrol ma zhi ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa rdzogs so //
translated: The chapter on the sādhana of Noble Tārā called Great Peace is complete.

original: / phyag 'tshal kun nas bas skor ba dga' ba'i //
analyzed: / phyag 'tshal kun nas bas skor ba dga' ba'i //
translated: Homage to the one who is surrounded by all,🔽who delights in

original: dgra yi lus ni rab tu 'gems ma //
analyzed: dgra yi lus ni rab tu 'gems ma //
translated: the body of enemies,

original: yi ge bcu po'i ngag ni bkod pa'i //
analyzed: yi ge bcu po'i ngag ni bkod pa'i //
translated: who is arranged in the speech of the ten syllables,

original: rig pa h'um las sgrol ma nyid ma //
analyzed: rig pa h'um las sgrol ma nyid ma //
translated: the knowledge Tārā from the syllable hūṃ.

original: rje btsun ma dmar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum ma /
analyzed: rje btsun ma dmar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum ma /
translated: The noble lady is red, with one face and three eyes,

original: phyag gnyis ma /
analyzed: phyag gnyis ma /
translated: with two arms,

original: padma dmar ser gyi steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /🔽g-yas thugs kar rtse gsum pa bsnams pa /
analyzed: padma dmar ser gyi steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa / g-yas thugs kar rtse gsum pa bsnams pa /
translated: sitting in the sattva posture on a red-orange lotus and sun maṇḍala,🔽holding a trident at the heart with the right hand,

original: g-yon snying po dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon snying po dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
translated: and holding a heart with the left hand.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma chags pa 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma chags pa 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so /
translated: The chapter of the method of accomplishing the Noble Tara, the Destroyer of Passion, is complete.

original: // / phyag 'tshal tu re zhabs ni brdabs pas //
analyzed: // / phyag 'tshal tu re zhabs ni brdabs pas //
translated: Homage to Tara, whose foot tramples on Tripura,

original: h'um yig rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma //
analyzed: h'um yig rnam pa'i sa bon nyid ma //
translated: whose seed syllable is the syllable hum,

original: ri rab manda ra dang 'bigs byed //
analyzed: ri rab manda ra dang 'bigs byed //
translated: who shakes Mount Meru, Mandara, and Vindhya,

original: 'jig rten gsum rnams g-yo ba nyid ma //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum rnams g-yo ba nyid ma //
translated: and shakes the three worlds.

original: rje btsun ma sku mdog dmar ser /
analyzed: rje btsun ma sku mdog dmar ser /
translated: The noble lady is yellow-red in color.

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
translated: She has one face and two arms.

original: padma dkar po'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma dkar po'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: She sits in the cross-legged posture of a bodhisattva on a sun maṇḍala on a white lotus.

original: phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o //
translated: Her two hands hold a moon maṇḍala at her heart.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba thams cad sgrub ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so /🔽// / phyag 'tshal lha yi mtsho yi rnam pa'i //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba thams cad sgrub ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa rdzogs so / // / phyag 'tshal lha yi mtsho yi rnam pa'i //
translated: The chapter of the method of accomplishing the Noble Tara, the Bestower of All Happiness, is complete.🔽Homage to Tara, who holds in her hand

original: ri dvags rtags can phyag na bsnams ma //
analyzed: ri dvags rtags can phyag na bsnams ma //
translated: the form of the celestial lake, marked with the sign of a deer,

original: t'a ra gnyis brjod phat kyi yi ges //
analyzed: t'a ra gnyis brjod phat kyi yi ges //
translated: and utters the syllables tara twice, followed by the syllable phat.

original: dug rnams ma lus par ni sel ma //
analyzed: dug rnams ma lus par ni sel ma //
translated: and all poisons without exception.

original: rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
analyzed: rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma /
translated: The noble White Tārā has one face and four arms.

original: padma dkar po dang zla ba'i gdan la ngang pa'i steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi sa bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma dkar po dang zla ba'i gdan la ngang pa'i steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi sa bzhugs pa /
translated: She sits on a seat of a white lotus and moon, upon a goose, in the sattva posture.

original: phyag dang po gnyis dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa /🔽g-yas gnyis pas mchog sbyin pa /
analyzed: phyag dang po gnyis dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa / g-yas gnyis pas mchog sbyin pa /
translated: Her first two hands are in the gesture of delight.🔽The second right hand makes the boon-granting gesture.

original: g-yon pa snying po dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa snying po dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The second left hand holds a blue lotus.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so //
translated: The eighteenth chapter, the section on the ritual of the noble Tārā called Jayā.

original: / phyag 'tshal lha yi tshogs rnams rgyal po //
analyzed: / phyag 'tshal lha yi tshogs rnams rgyal po //
translated: Homage to the queen of the hosts of gods,

original: lha dang mi 'am yis bsten ma //
analyzed: lha dang mi 'am yis bsten ma //
translated: the one who is served by gods and kinnaras,

original: kun nas go cha dga' ba'i brjid kyis //
analyzed: kun nas go cha dga' ba'i brjid kyis //
translated: who is adorned with the splendor of the armor of joy,

original: rtsod dang rmi lam ngan pa sel ma /🔽rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal @10a * //
analyzed: rtsod dang rmi lam ngan pa sel ma / rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal @10a * //
translated: who removes disputes and bad dreams.

original: gcig phyag gnyis ma /
analyzed: gcig phyag gnyis ma /
translated: The noble White Tārā has one face and two arms.

original: padma dkar po dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma dkar po dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: She sits in the sattva posture upon a moon and sun disk, upon a white lotus.

original: 'od zer gyi phreng bas brgyan pa /
analyzed: 'od zer gyi phreng bas brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with a garland of light rays.

original: phyag gnyis kyi thugs kar me'i snod bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyi thugs kar me'i snod bsnams pa'o //
translated: In her two hands she holds a fire-vessel at her heart.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma sdug bsngal thams cad bsreg pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs so /🔽// / phyag 'tshal nyi ma zla brgyas pa'i //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma sdug bsngal thams cad bsreg pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs so / // / phyag 'tshal nyi ma zla brgyas pa'i //
translated: The nineteenth chapter is concluded.🔽Homage to the one with two eyes,

original: spyan gnyis po la 'od rab gsal ma //
analyzed: spyan gnyis po la 'od rab gsal ma //
translated: shining with light from a hundred suns and moons.

original: ha ra gnyis brjod tutt'a re yis //
analyzed: ha ra gnyis brjod tutt'a re yis //
translated: By uttering the two syllables hara and tuttare

original: shin tu drag po'i rims ni sel ma //
analyzed: shin tu drag po'i rims ni sel ma //
translated: you remove the most virulent of fevers.

original: rje btsun ma dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
analyzed: rje btsun ma dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
translated: The exalted lady is yellow, with one face and two arms.

original: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: padma dmar po dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: She sits in the sattva posture upon a red lotus and moon disk.

original: phyag gnyis kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: In her two hands she holds a golden-colored vase.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so /🔽// / phyag 'tshal de nyid gsum rnams bkod pas //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste nyi shu pa rdzogs so / // / phyag 'tshal de nyid gsum rnams bkod pas //
translated: The twentieth chapter of the sādhana called “The Origin of All Siddhis of Noble Tārā” is complete.🔽Homage to you, who are endowed with the power of peace,

original: zhi ba'i mthu dang yang dag ldan ma //
analyzed: zhi ba'i mthu dang yang dag ldan ma //
translated: Arranged in the three realities,🔽The supreme Ture, who conquers

original: gdon dang ro langs gnod sbyin tshogs rnams //🔽'joms pa tu re'i rab mchog nyid ma //
analyzed: gdon dang ro langs gnod sbyin tshogs rnams // 'joms pa tu re'i rab mchog nyid ma //
translated: The hosts of grahas, vetālas, and yakṣas.

original: rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: rje btsun ma dkar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum pa /
translated: The noble white Tārā has one face, three eyes,

original: phyag gnyis pa /
analyzed: phyag gnyis pa /
translated: and two arms.

original: khyu mchog gi steng na padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: khyu mchog gi steng na padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
translated: She stands in half-dance posture on a lotus and moon disc upon a bull,

original: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa /🔽g-yas pa phreng pa /
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa / g-yas pa phreng pa /
translated: wearing a tiger-skin skirt.🔽Her right hand holds a rosary,

original: g-yon rtse gsum pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon rtse gsum pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: and her left a trident.

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su rdzogs par byed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma yongs su rdzogs par byed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so //
translated: The twenty-first chapter of the sādhana called “The Perfection of Noble Tārā” is complete.

original: /'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba kha che'i pandi ta slob dpon nyi ma spabs pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: /'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba kha che'i pandi ta slob dpon nyi ma spabs pas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
translated: The Sādhana of the Twenty-One Praises of Noble Tārā, called the Method, composed by the Kashmiri master Raviśrījñāna.

original: pandi ta manydzu shr'i dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba mal gyo blo gros grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: pandi ta manydzu shr'i dang bod kyi lo ts'a ba mal gyo blo gros grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: It was translated, edited, and finalized by the paṇḍita Mañjuśrī and the Tibetan translator Mal Yerpa Blo gros grags pa.
